content: _"Emotion is the child of uncertainty, born from the touch of experience. Once hidden inside the Buddha's head, this treasure has a secret yet to be revealed."_
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Feeling.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Feeling'.
The content is as follows:
_"Emotion is the child of uncertainty, born from the touch of experience. Once hidden inside the Buddha's head, this treasure has a secret yet to be revealed."_
